name: Post Detail Financial Transaction
description: Posts detailed financial transaction data to patient accounts for billing and revenue cycle processing
hl7Reference: HL7 v2.3 Chapter 6 Financial Management - HL7.eu/HL7v2x/v23/std23
businessPurpose: Transmit detailed financial transactions including charges, adjustments, and payments to patient accounting systems
timing: Sent when financial transactions occur that need to be posted to patient accounts
standardNotes: DFT message carries detailed financial transaction data
FT1 segment contains the core transaction details
Use for charges, credits, adjustments, and payments
EVN.2 should contain the transaction posting date/time
realWorldScenarios: Laboratory charge posted to patient account after test completion
Insurance payment allocation to specific patient charges
Adjustment for contractual allowance on procedure billing
Copayment collection at point of service
Late charge assessment for overdue account balances
Charity care write-off for qualified patient accounts

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Critical - financial accuracy affects billing, compliance, and revenue integrity
